entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@JamesSurowiecki @windmillcharger 5,000 COVID-19 deaths a week, my calculations Are That approximately 20 weeks to Election Day another 100,000 Americans will be dead by Election Day! It is not OK! But, there isn’t Jack that I Can Do!

If Trump keeps us Riled up & Marching More of us will Die before Election Day!
